habits—no matter large small—have three components according neurological studies theres cue—a trigger particular behavior routine behavior reward brain decides whether remember habit future hopkins identified tooth film found cue existed eons moreover reward hopkins promising hard resist doesnt want prettier smile particularly takes quick brush pepsodent

first find simple obvious cue
second clearly define rewards
even today hopkinss rules staple marketing textbooks theyre cited boardrooms advertising offices business school classrooms
thats full explanation pepsodent success theres another rule even hopkins time didnt understand
